REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0223 reute u f BC-C.-ITOH-SEES-NO-GROWT 06-19 0108

TEXT.TITLE: C. ITOH SEES NO GROWTH IN 1987/88 GROUP PROFIT
TEXT.BODY: C. Itoh and Co Ltd <CITT.T> said its group net profit in the year ending March 31, 1988, is expected to be unchanged from a year earlier. The prediction assumes a yen/dollar rate of 140 yen and a crude oil price of 18 dlrs a barrel, a company spokesman told Reuters. Sales in 1987/88 are estimated at 15,100 billion yen, up 2.3 pct from a year earlier. The company earlier reported group net profit of 20.07 billion yen in the year ended March 31, 1987, up 8.6 pct from a year earlier, helped by a drop in sales and administration costs and reduced interest charges. REUTER
